user.title: Connect to Duco
user.description: Please enter the local IP address as the API Endpoint to access your Duco connectivity board, as well as Duco Box properties (optional).

error.auth: Authentication failed. Please check your API token and/or API endpoint.
error.api: Failed to connect to the Duco API. Please check the API endpoint and try again or check the logs for more info.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the logs for more info.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of Duco is allowed.
